response.overview: Both Seol-Hwa and Su-Ran, who are sisters, support their living by selling white coloured rose. When the subordinates of Maeng Cheon-Kal, or the governor of Pyeongnam Province, attack them, Mu-Rang rescues them. Two sisters' father named Tak Won-Chang is blind. Maeng attacks Tak's house when he is surrounded by the enemy, but is hurt by Mu-Rang. At that time, Seol-Hwa infiltrates into Maeng's room to deprive him of a map that her father is looking for. Seol-Hwa is discovered by Cheon Kwan-Suk to fight each other fiercely, and barely escapes and returns to her father thanks to Mu-Rang's help. Tak makes up his mind to go to a snowy field of Mt. Talmasan. Being aware that Su-Ran, or younger sister, loves Mu-Rang, Seol-Hwa hide herself. At the moment when a snowy tomb is dug at Mt. Talmasan.............
response.title: Two Sisters
